Improvements.Description: Instead of calling `entityDictionary.bindEntity()` multiple times, you can use an array of classes to loop through and bind each entity. This will make your code cleaner and easier to maintain.

Improvements.Change_Diff: This is a conceptual change and cannot be represented with a simple git diff. The entire structure from lines 22 to 91 would be replaced with the new implementation using a Map and lambda functions.
Improvements.Description: The long if-else structure is hard to read and maintain. You can refactor it by using a Map with url-endings as keys and lambda functions as values. This way, you can retrieve the appropriate function to check each url, which makes the code cleaner and easier to read.

Method_Improvements.Final code: This is a conceptual change and cannot be represented with a simple final code. The entire method would be refactored according to the improvements suggested.
